Package ePortfolio

package ePortfolio
  • Class
    Description
    BuyPanel
    The BuyPanel class represents the panel in the GUI where users can buy investments.
    GainPanel
    The GainPanel class represents the panel in the GUI where users can see the gain on they're investments.
    GUI
    This class is used to implement all panels through a menu and handle file reading and writing.
    InitialPanel
    The IntialPanel class represents the boot up panel in the GUI.
    Investment
    This class is used for the to initialize investment object to be used in other children catches such as stock and mutual fund
    MessageListener
    listener interface for ePortfolio panels and functions
    MutualFund
    This class is used for the mutual fund data, containing mutual fund information for symbol, name, quantity, price, and bookvalue
    Portfolio
    This class is used to perform different operations on an ePortfolio of stocks and mutual funds
    SearchPanel
    The SearchPanel class represents the panel in the GUI where users can search for investments.
    SellPanel
    The SellPanel class represents the panel in the GUI where users can sell investments.
    Stock
    This class is used for the stock data, containing stock information for symbol, name, quantity, price, and bookvalue
    UpdatePanel
    The UpdatePanel class represents the panel in the GUI where users can update investments prices.
